description:
A do-it-all shirt for free range living. The performance-knit fabric wicks sweat and moves with you for comfort in a range of temperatures. Soft, cotton like fabric has permanent odour control that's welcome when you're hitching into a trail-side town. Awesome for cross-country hiking and any hot-weather activity.

  • 100% polyester spun jersey with Polygiene® permanent odor control
  • Set in sleeves with underarm gussets for chafe-free comfort and range of motion
  • Locker loop makes it easy to hang dry
  • No tags at neck for itch-free comfort
  • Fair Trade Certified™ sewn
name: Patagonia Capilene Cool Long Sleeve Trail Shirt - Men's
